401.description: The endpoint requires authentication or the authentication artifact supplied in the request is invalid, outdated (expired) or ill-formed.

403.description: The authenticated user of request lacks of required privileges in order to access the data or execute the specified action.

404.description: The request contains an access to an entity with a specified identifier, which actually does not exist in the platform. What is more, this status code might be returned in a few more scenarios, which are explicitly disclaimed in the endpoint documentation.

422.description: The request for creating an instance of a specific entity has been failed due to ill-formed entity form. Refer to the response to fix the situation.

429.description: The quota available for the user has been exceeded.

500.description: An internal server error has been occurred, contact with *STMS* platform support in order to resolve the situation, or post a *radar*.
